title: Amazon | SDE - I | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE from Tier 2 College, Graduated 2023
Years of Experience: 0.5 Years 
Prior Experience: Early Age Startup + 6 Months Internship at Amazon + 2 Months Internship at Goldman Sachs
Date of the Offer: January 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer I/L4
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 19,17,000 
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1,50,000 Relocation bonus + 6,47,000 1st Year Sign On bonus + 5,18,000 2nd Year Sign On bonus
Stock bonus: 15,56,000 (5% first year + 15% Second Year + 20% Every 6 months after 2nd Year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 27,91,800 for First Year
Benefits: 4,000 monthly for transportation, 1,250 monthly Internet reimbursement, 1,100 Meal card, Annual Health Checkup and other standard benefits.
Other details: 15( Annual Leave ), 12( Sick Leave ), 12( Casual Leave ) and 10 (Mandatory and optional holiday)

title: Coinbase| IC4 |Remote
content:
Education: B.Tech in CS from Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 4+ years
Prior Experience: Startup (SDE)
Current Comp:- 47LPA (All fixed)
Offer Date:- January 2023
Company: Deliveroo
Title/Level: SDE L4
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Rs.42,80,000
Signing Bonus:NA
Stock bonus: $27500/per year
Bonus: 5 %
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): Rs.70,00,000

No negotitation room as they have fixed band. Is it safe to join coinbase now, given the current market condition?
Also how is the work life at coinbase?
